channel.title: How Do I make a 1 hander weapon to a 2 hander?
channel.description:
Well I'am having trouble I have my dragon claws and you can wear with a sheild on.
And I don't want it to have a sheild on with the dragon claws..
If you can help that would be awesome.
Thank you - Monkey Money30

item.title: How Do I make a 1 hander weapon to a 2 hander?
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_Dibiase Kyle_Dibiase
item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

[quote=“xpatx, post:2, topic:276355”]Well create a method allowing you do equip 2H’s alone so something like…

[code=java]
public static int[] TWO_HANDED = {ID, ID};

public void twoHandCheck() {
if(TWO_HANDED) {
//Methods
} else {
if(!TWO_HANDED) {
//Methods
}[/code]

Somewhere to that parameter, and btw. Your signature that ‘boolean’ you added is messed up. OWN_NOOBZ = true, you need the underscore. d:[/quote]

I Believe It Should Be Something Like This

[code=java]
public static int[] twoHanded = {ID, ID};

public void twoHandCheck() {
if(twoHanded) {
//Methods
} else {
if(!twoHanded) {
//Methods
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make a 1 hander weapon to a 2 hander?

item.title: How Do I make a 1 hander weapon to a 2 hander?
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

Well create a method allowing you do equip 2H’s alone so something like…

[code=java]
public static int[] TWO_HANDED = {ID, ID};

public void twoHandCheck() {
if(TWO_HANDED) {
//Methods
} else {
if(!TWO_HANDED) {
//Methods
}[/code]

Somewhere to that parameter, and btw. Your signature that ‘boolean’ you added is messed up. OWN_NOOBZ = true, you need the underscore. d:

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make a 1 hander weapon to a 2 hander?
